title: Ketu Transit in the 9th House for Aries Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your 9th house brings detachment from rigid belief systems, external guidance, and inherited philosophies. This phase weakens blind faith in doctrines, teachers, or moral frameworks, pushing you toward inner truth-seeking. Long-distance travel or higher learning may feel purposeless unless aligned with deeper meaning. Confusion with mentors or father figures can arise, yet spiritual insight deepens through self-inquiry. Ketu dissolves borrowed wisdom, demanding experiential understanding rather than belief-driven direction.

sections.heading: Higher Learning & Wisdom
points: Loss of interest in formal education paths

sections.heading: Mentors & Father Figures
points: Emotional distance from teachers or guides

sections.heading: Travel & Expansion
points: Journeys feel inward rather than external

sections.heading: Purpose & Direction
points: Release of borrowed goals and ideals

closing: Ketu in the 9th house dissolves borrowed belief systems. Inner inquiry transforms confusion into authentic spiritual wisdom.
